trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che identifica in modo univoco il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che identifica in modo univoco il <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la stringa che descrive la funzionalità del <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: In genere, questa stringa restituisce lo stesso testo fornito nella descrizione comando per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The string describing the functionality of the element.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che descrive la funzionalità dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> destinato al <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se l'elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>controllo, il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>metodo può recuperare il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>per <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>cui è associata a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> per l'elemento che è la destinazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.
